Class SockJSBridgeOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.ext.web.handler.sockjs.SockJSBridgeOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BridgeOptions

    public class SockJSBridgeOptions
extends Object
    Options for configuring the event bus bridge.

    Tim Fox
